titleStmt.title: The priuiledges of the vpright in heart Expressed in brief meditations upon the 84 Psalme: and more particularly vpon the 11 verse thereof. Studied for the vse of the right worshipfull Company of Drapers London By W.F.
titleStmt.author: Freake, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Harper for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop at the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 11347a on UMI microfilm reel 644.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
